plant.question: I have leaves and a stem, but no legs to run. I need water to grow big and strong. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I start as a tiny seed.
☀️ I love sunshine!
💧 I need you to water me.

plant.question: I have a long, green body and little yellow hairs on my cob. People like to eat me with butter. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 Farmers grow me in fields.
👂 I have a cob under my leaves.
😋 I am tasty with salt.

plant.question: I grow on a tree and am red, green, or yellow. Sometimes I am used to make juice or pies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White loved me!
🌳 I hang from branches.
🥧 I can be baked into a dessert.

plant.question: I have a prickly stem and beautiful petals. I am often given as a gift to show love. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am a popular flower.
🥀 Be careful of my thorns!
💌 People give me on Valentine's day.

plant.question: I am long and orange and grow underground. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny's favorite snack.
🌱 I am a root vegetable.
👓 I can help you see in the dark!

plant.question: I am a very tall plant with a thick woody trunk and many branches. Birds often build their homes in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I give shade on a sunny day.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I'm a berry that is blue and grows on bushes. I am often put in muffins and pancakes. What am I?

hints.text: 🫐 I am small and round.
🥞 I taste great in breakfast food.
🟦 I am a specific color.

plant.question: I am a green vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. Some people don't like to eat me, but I am very healthy. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I am a cruciferous vegetable.
💪 Eating me makes you strong!
💚 I am the same color as grass.

plant.question: I am a seed that is roasted to make a hot drink. I grow in warm climates and have a very distinct smell. What am I?

hints.text: ☕ People drink me to wake up.
🌍 I am grown near the equator.
😴 I have caffeine in me.

plant.question: I am a plant that can survive in the desert. I have thick, spiny skin to protect myself from animals and help me store water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I live where it is very dry.
🏜️ I can be found in the desert.
💧 I store water in my body.

transport.question: I have wheels and carry people around town. I stop at bus stops. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I am bigger than a car.
🛑 People wait for me at a specific place.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Many people can ride me at once.

transport.question: I float on the water, but I'm not a duck. I can take you to faraway lands. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am very big and strong.
⚓ I need an anchor to stay in one place.
🌍 I travel across oceans.

transport.question: I travel on rails and carry lots of people. I often go very fast between cities. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I only travel on a special path.
💨 I can be powered by electricity.
📣 Listen for the whistle.

transport.question: I have two wheels, but I'm not a bicycle. I make a lot of noise and go very fast. What am I?

hints.text: ⛑️ You should wear a helmet when riding me.
⛽ I need gasoline to run.
🏍️ I am faster than a bicycle.

transport.question: I fly in the sky, but I'm not a bird. I carry people to different countries. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I have wings and a tail.
☁️ I fly very high above the clouds.
💺 I have many seats inside.

transport.question: I am very big and carry lots of cargo on the road, what am I?

hints.text: 📦 I often carry goods in a trailer.
🚚 I am bigger than a car.
🛣️ You can see me on the highway.

transport.question: I help people get to the moon. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast.
👩‍🚀 Astronauts ride inside me.
🌌 I travel to outer space.

transport.question: I carry people across a body of water but am not a boat. I hang from cables high above. What am I?

hints.text: 🌉 I am part of a larger structure.
🚠 I am suspended in the air.
🌊 I connect two land masses separated by water.

transport.question: I can travel on both land and water. I’m faster than a car on water, but slower on land. What am I?

hints.text: ⚙️ I have a propeller.
🛶 I float on the water but also have wheels.
🌊 Sometimes I'm used by the military.

transport.question: I'm a vehicle powered by sails, but I don't always need wind to move, especially in the city. I can also be used in water. What am I?

hints.text: ⛵ I used to depend entirely on the wind.
🏡 I am also a type of small apartment.
🌊 I am good in both water and on land.
